sections.MISSION: Bull Troop, 1st Squadron, 2CR executes M500/M17 qualification range at Range 122 on 25JUL24 IOT increase the lethality of the Troop and maintain proficiency.
sections.PURPOSE: Increase the lethality of the Troop and maintain proficiency
sections.KEY TASKS: in this phase will be proper police call of the range and accountability of all personnel and equipment. Phase 4: Will begin with RTB from RG 122 and will end when all weapons have been maintained and turned into the arms room. Key to this phase is a safe movement to Rose Barracks.
sections.EXECUTION: Phase 1: Will begin with arrival at RG 122 and will end with confirmation of targetry.
